item.description:
Let's Rock the Rosebud for charity!

Come dance and sing out loud to the best of today's modern/alt rock tunes as well some some original material! Since it's Thanksgiving season the bands are suggesting a small donation to the Playing For Change Foundation that is "connecting the world through music & arts education". Click to be inspired --> http://www.playingforchange.com/episodes/38/Imagine

The bands will be donating the entertainment for the cause - so come down and join these meetup groups in making a difference while having a great time!

Boston Live Music

Beantown and Beyond

Central Mass Singles

An Adventurous Life

The World is Our Playground

Social Fun

Schedule:
8pm - 9pm............ Listen to Mr.Reliable
930 - midnight....... Listen to Wall of Sound
item.name: Rock The Rosebud Charity
